name: Vinay Shimpi
position: Upcoming Mechatronics Engineer at Jaguar Land Rover, 5th year undergraduate | IIT Kharagpur

current_company.name: Teamkart FSAE Team , IIT Kharagpur
current_company.title: Upcoming Mechatronics Engineer at Jaguar Land Rover, 5th year undergraduate | IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Undergraduate Student Researcher
experience.description: TeamKART is the formula Student team of IIT Kharagpur, established in 2008. we design and manufacture formula Student style vehicle and participate in fsae organized competitions. being a part of team as trainee in first year, member in second year and chassis subsystem head in my third year, I have delivered following contributions for the team.Selected and guided 48 first-year students in the fundamental aspects of automotive and mechanical engineering. Trained 4 members in various concepts of chassis design and manufacturing and mentored 16 members for FSEV 2022developed a spaceframe chassis for Formula Student racing vehicle with mounts for various parts of the Vehicle.Designed the thermal management system for vehicle, including dual liquid pumps, battery, motor, inverter and radiator with Optimized design of an battery pack.Involved in the Project and financial planning, Mechanical design, procurement and manufacturing of chassis and overall vehicle
experience.description_html: TeamKART is the formula Student team of IIT Kharagpur, established in 2008. we design and manufacture formula Student style vehicle and participate in fsae organized competitions. being a part of team as trainee in first year, member in second year and chassis subsystem head in my third year, I have delivered following contributions for the team.Selected and guided 48 first-year students in the fundamental aspects of automotive and mechanical engineering. Trained 4 members in various concepts of chassis design and manufacturing and mentored 16 members for FSEV 2022developed a spaceframe chassis for Formula Student racing vehicle with mounts for various parts of the Vehicle.Designed the thermal management system for vehicle, including dual liquid pumps, battery, motor, inverter and radiator with Optimized design of an battery pack.Involved in the Project and financial planning, Mechanical design, procurement and manufacturing of chassis and overall vehicle
